title: Rosemary and sea salt focaccia
description: Great for sharing, and made even better with the use of a really fine extra virgin olive oil. This is delicious served warm as a starter or indeed as a meal in itself with fresh tomatoes, artichokes and cold meats.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
80ml/3fl oz olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
vegetable oil or oil spray, for oiling
